Package com.dimasDermawanJBusIO

Class Payment

java.lang.Object
com.dimasDermawanJBusIO.dbjson.Serializable
com.dimasDermawanJBusIO.Invoice
com.dimasDermawanJBusIO.Payment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Serializable>
public class Payment extends Invoice
Represents a payment for a bus booking, extending the functionality of an Invoice. Includes details such as the bus ID, booked seats, and departure date.
Author:
Dimas Dermawan

  • Method Details

    • availableSchedule

      public static Schedule availableSchedule(Timestamp departureSchedule, String seat, Bus bus)
      Finds an available schedule for a specific departure schedule and seat in a given bus.
      Parameters:
      departureSchedule - The timestamp of the departure schedule.
      seat - The seat number.
      bus - The bus instance.
      Returns:
      The available schedule or null if not found.

    • makeBooking

      public static boolean makeBooking(Timestamp departureSchedule, String seat, Bus bus)
      Books a seat for a specific departure schedule in a given bus.
      Parameters:
      departureSchedule - The timestamp of the departure schedule.
      seat - The seat number to book.
      bus - The bus instance.
      Returns:
      True if booking is successful, false otherwise.

    • makeBooking

      Books a list of seats for a specific departure schedule in a given bus.
      Parameters:
      departureSchedule - The timestamp of the departure schedule.
      seats - The list of seat numbers to book.
      bus - The bus instance.
      Returns:
